title: Flexible Power Accelerates Data-Center Projects, Princeton Says
description: Big data centers equipped to supply their own power during heatwaves and other emergencies can begin operations much more quickly than those reliant solely on traditional utility hookups, according to a new study.
content: (Bloomberg) Big data centers equipped to supply their own power during heatwaves and other emergencies can begin operations much more quickly than those reliant solely on traditional utility hookups,… [+4730 chars]
